feed.title: AO3 - Clark Kent/Bruce Wayne (Filtered)
feed.subtitle: Latest works for Clark Kent/Bruce Wayne on Archive of Our Own [English, No ABO]

entry.title: Wholly Human
entry.summary:
Author: unpeumacabre

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,778Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 211

Summary: Strange, eldritch things are afoot in Gotham City. It looks like a job for Superman...?Clark Kent, writer from up-and-coming Metropolitan periodical The Daily Planet, is sent to investigate the appearance of a mysterious winged demon - known as the Bat-Man - a creature responsible for terrorising the local constabulary and wreaking general havoc among the good people of Gotham City. However, Clark has a secret - he's also Metropolis' celebrated hero, Superman. And as Superman, he's determined not just to report on, but to stop the Bat-Man from carrying out its fiendish deeds.Instead, he finds more than he bargained for: a web of intrigue surrounding the Viscount of Gotham, Bruce Wayne; his father, who disappeared in a mysterious explosion in Wayne Manor thirty years ago; and Jack Napier, the slightly unhinged Commissioner of the Gotham police force. Unravelling the secrets of Gotham City may turn out to be far too Herculean a task for Superman to undertake, after all...AKA the Victorian Beauty and the Beast AU that got a bit out of hand. Writing is complete - chapters are being slowly released.

entry.title: The Gotham Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: taropot

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 364Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Gotham’s elite have returned from their summer estates and rehab retreats for another season of charity galas, power marriages, and scandalous whispers. At the centre of it all? An anonymous online gossip columnist known only as The Gotham Ghost — ruthless, relentless, and impeccably well-informed. No one is safe from their barbed prose. Not even Gotham’s golden boy: Bruce Wayne, billionaire bachelor, society’s favourite frivolous playboy. And certainly not the Batman. Scandal is served. Ships will sail. Reputations will crumble. And the Ghost? They’ll be watching it all unfold, martini in hand.A Bridgerton-inspired AU set in modern-day Gotham society — where it’s all old money, masquerade fundraisers, and public outrage in the latest designer. Satirical, slowburn, and a little bit unhinged, featuring Superbat and enough side ships to sink a yacht.

entry.title: From Gotham with Love
entry.summary:
Author: anxiousdepressedintrovert

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,020Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 43

Summary: Martha and Thomas Wayne are the pinnacle of success in Gotham. Their daughter, Beatrice, is their crown jewel. One night everything changes. Martha and Thomas are gunned down and Beatrice is kidnapped. She returns two years later, changed. How will Gotham react to the little girl that's returned to them? And the shadows she's brought with her.

entry.title: Thawing Out
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,353Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 56

Summary: “The Batman?”Clark's cheeks were warm but he pushed forward regardless, “What, um, what do you make of him? He's been working in Gotham for about a year now, right?”“I wouldn't know. I've never met him,” Bruce shrugged, “And I don't think I'd like to.”“How come?”“He's violent. I can't say he hasn't been of some benefit - anyone can see that he’s exposed quite a lot of Gotham's underbelly, pointed out the flaws. But running around in a bat costume can hardly be regarded as the actions of a sane and well-adjusted man,” He said, a faint tug at one corner of his lips, a huff of derision in his tone, “Wouldn’t you agree?” Clark and Bruce have lunch. Their not-quite-a-friendship seems to bloom.(continues directly from part 10)

entry.title: It's Not One
entry.summary:
Author: kingsarah

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,051Chapters: 4/9Kudos: 67

Summary: One name written over a heart tying two people together. One pair of soulmates trying to figure out what that means.Clark and Bruce have finally come together and accepted each other as soulmates, but it’s not happily ever after yet. One thing after another causes turbulence in their budding relationship. Just because they are soulmates doesn’t mean the path is smooth. But maybe it’s not one thing that defines a relationship, but innumerable little actions over time.Sequel to Redamancy.

entry.title: weak and powerless (over you)
entry.summary:
Author: byzantinedaydeams

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,923Chapters: 2/16Kudos: 62

Summary: Batman doesn’t trust Superman as far as he can throw him. As it turns out, with a little (a lot) of Kryptonite, that’s not very far. While Batman doesn’t normally compromise his rules, Bruce Wayne deals in gray areas. Compartmentalizing has its perks, and they taste like strawberry lip balm. Although it might seem like their common lifestyles as vigilantes make them a perfect match, as they get to know each other better, they each realize that there is more to the other than meets the eye.(Or: Clark gets a metric fuck-ton of Kryptonite stuck in his body and Bruce decides he’s allowed to break his unwritten “don’t kiss Clark” rule)

entry.title: Hiding In Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: aster_ion

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,664Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 140

Summary: Batman is wary of Superman. He doesn't trust the all powerful alien – he's seen firsthand how absolute power can corrupt an individual. It’s only a matter of time before he snaps.Clark Kent is wary of Bruce Wayne. He's met too many men like him – charming, arrogant, and swimming in more money than they know what to do with. He’s hiding something, Clark is sure of it.Bruce would do anything to learn more about the threat Superman poses, so when an unassuming new reporter with mysterious connections to the superhero takes over the Gotham beat, he doesn’t pass up the opportunity.Seducing Clark Kent wasn’t exactly the plan, but hey, Bruce isn’t complaining.
